DFr_067E64AD.Text.Text: I desired rest. ^^^^^^^^^A life finally free from fear and discomfort. ^^^^^^...I did not wish to be trapped in this realm, ^^^^debating for all eternity.

DFr_6C188267.Text.Text: Accepting the Arbiter’s challenge was a foolish choice, ^^^Mr. Jones. ^^^^^^But needless to say, ^^^^I can understand why you did so.

DFr_4E2272E7.Text.Text: And ignorant as you are, ^^^^^you have given me reason to reexamine my principles.

DFr_4E2272E7.Text.Context: Flow/hobbesa3_correct_4/07_hobbes: "And ignorant as you are, ^^^^^you h..."

DFr_ADF23185.Text.Text: I shall now take my leave.

DFr_ADF23185.Text.Context: Flow/hobbesa3_correct_4/07_hobbes: "I shall now take my leave."
